706769f-a.text:
Shore Road, north from 7end Street. One of many apartments erected in this area. It is one of the finest residential places in this Borough.
June S, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

706770f-a.text:
Shore Road, east side, south of 72nd Street, showing a building on land
which at one time belonged to John L. Bennett.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
